solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean wordPattern(String pattern, String str) {--newline--        String[] words = str.split(" ");--newline--        if (words.length != pattern.length())--newline--            return false;--newline--        Map index = new HashMap();--newline--        for (Integer i=0; i<words.length; ++i)--newline--            if (index.put(pattern.charAt(i), i) != index.put(words[i], i))--newline--                return false;--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
